bibl.title: Early Christian Architecture in the Nile Valley.
bibl.note: A discussion of Christian architecture in Egypt during Late Roman and Early Christian times (313 A.D.-640/42): church architecture, funerary architecture, monastic architecture.
bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter, Early Christian Architecture in the Nile Valley.
H. HONDELINK (Ed.), Coptic Art and Culture (Cairo, 1990) pp. 3-18, 6 plans sur 2 pll.
